ygData.subject: Bard Song Analysis v2.0 available!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all!  I hope everyone is having a great Independance Day weekend.  Just wanted to let you know that I finally gathered up enough strength to wretch
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all! I hope everyone is having a great Independance Day
weekend. Just wanted to let you know that I finally gathered up enough
strength to wretch myself away from EverQuest long enough to update the Bard
Song Analysis. So much stuff has been added since v1.6 that I decided to go
ahead and make the new version v2.0. I've also got a better way of
distributing the document as well. The good people at the EQ Bardic Guide
have been kind enough to post it at http://www.harpers.net/bard .
I just wanted to say that this mailing list has been a vaulable soure
of
information to this document. I'd like to say 'thank you' to everyone who
has
contributed to any of the meaningful discussions here.


-Alex
aka: Goatnatos, lvl 22 Bard, Povar Server
